thread.title: Breathtaking pictures of the Milky Way snapped by Russian ambulance driver
thread.title_full: Breathtaking pictures of the Milky Way snapped by Russian ambulance driver

title: Breathtaking pictures of the Milky Way snapped by Russian ambulance driver
text:
The snaps show the beauty of the night sky looming above the unique landscapes of rural Russia and Georgia. 
From mountainous landscapes to barren Russian meadows, the jaw-dropping photographs will quite literally blow your mind. CATERS The snaps show the beauty of the night sky 
Speaking about the snaps, Boris said: "There's nothing quite like photographing the night sky. 
"I photograph where I travel. We're blessed in this part of the world with the beauty of the Crimea, the meadows in mid-Russia and the strength of the North Caucasus Mountains. 
"The finest thing about night shooting is the opportunity to remain alone with nature, space and also to move apart from the framework of human perception." 
The ambulance driver uses a Canon 6D camera and an array of different lenses to capture the starry pictures with a specialised Vixen Polarie star tracker mount. CATERS Boris Dmitriev took the pictures, which are doing the rounds on the internet CATERS Unique landscapes of rural Russia show off the Milky Way 
He said: "It's taken me years to perfect the skill and get the right equipment together. 
"I love that the pictures look almost-supernatural. The feeling of the performed work eclipses the monotony of everyday life. 
"It makes you understand that we are the part of the Universe and here, you became closer to it." Related articles
